name: Odyssey of Growth
description:
To play the functional version, please download the Standalone build from: 
 https://rasofiagames.com/files/KenneyJam2022.zip

I did not change anything from the submission but make a standalone build.

It seems the HUD is not working because the animation that tweens them in is not triggering in the WebGL version. It is required to see where you are on the map and to use your items. So that makes the submission unplayable.

Excuse me for the inconvenience.
